import React, { useContext } from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' import DataContext from '../../data/DataContext' const UseContext = (props) => { const {state, setState} = useContext(DataContext) function addNumber(delta) { context.setSate({ ...state, number: state.number + delta }) } return (
{state.text} {state.number}
) } export default UseContext
